        public static java.util.List<java.awt.Point> getEllipse(java.awt.Point position,
                                                        java.awt.Dimension dimension)
        Constructs a list, containing the outline, of an ellipse's points by using the Bresenham algorithm,
        Parameters:
        position - The x/y-axis (column/row) coordinates of the top-left character.
        dimension - The width/height.
        Returns:
        The list of points.

      • getLine

        public static java.util.List<java.awt.Point> getLine(int fromX,
                                                     int fromY,
                                                     int toX,
                                                     int toY)
        Constructs a list, containing the path, of a line's points by using the Bresenham algorithm,
        Parameters:
        fromX - The x-axis (column) coordinate of the start point of the line.
        fromY - The y-axis (row) coordinate of the start point of the line.
        toX - The x-axis (column) coordinate of the end point of the line.
        toY - The y-axis (row) coordinate of the end point of the line.
        Returns:
        The list of points.

        Parameters:
